description:
Forza Horizon 5 is the latest installment of the popular Forza Horizon open-world racing game series. Some key details:

• It was released in November 2021 for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and PC.

• The game is set in Mexico and features over 400 cars at launch.

• There's support for ray tracing on Series X|S and high-end PCs, giving the graphics a realistic look.

• In addition to traditional racing events, there are expedition races where you explore the vast map and complete challenges.

• There are also stunt arenas and PR stunts where you can perform tricks.

• The game features a four-player co-op mode where you can explore and race with your friends.

• Forza Horizon 5 has an online component where you can compete against other players in races and other events.

• The game features a livery editor so you can customize the look of your cars.

In summary, Forza Horizon 5 aims to build on the fun open-world racing gameplay of previous Forza Horizon titles, with a new beautiful setting in Mexico, more cars, and improved graphics thanks to the new consoles and ray tracing. It's received very positive reviews from critics and players for delivering another enjoyable and addictive racing experience.
name: forza horizon 5

yoast_head_json.og_description: Forza Horizon 5 is the latest installment of the popular Forza Horizon open-world racing game series. Some key details: • It was released in November 2021 for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and PC. • The game is set in Mexico and features over 400 cars at launch. • There’s support for ray tracing on Series X|S and high-end PCs, giving the graphics a realistic look. • In addition to traditional racing events, there are expedition races where you explore the vast map and complete challenges. • There are also stunt arenas and PR stunts where you can perform tricks. • The game features a four-player co-op mode where you can explore and race with your friends. • Forza Horizon 5 has an online component where you can compete against other players in races and other events. • The game features a livery editor so you can customize the look of your cars. In summary, Forza Horizon 5 aims to build on the fun open-world racing gameplay of previous Forza Horizon titles, with a new beautiful setting in Mexico, more cars, and improved graphics thanks to the new consoles and ray tracing. It’s received very positive reviews from critics and players for delivering another enjoyable and addictive racing experience.
